import { toast } from 'react-toastify' import './foodItem.css' const FoodItem = (props) => { const { foodItem } = props sessionStorage['count']=0 let count = 0 const addItem = () => { count = count + 1 toast.success("Added To Cart") sessionStorage['count'] = count window.location.reload(false); } // console.log(foodItem.name) return (
{foodItem.name} Price: ${foodItem.price}
{foodItem.description}
) } export default FoodItem
